list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Which do you prefer – tea or coffee?
I prefer reading to watching television
She would prefer to come with you rather than stay here.

list_ex_of_english: Note that the presence of weak constraints has no influence on the worst-case complexity of deciding the existence of (preferred) answer sets.
Depending on the particular problem and the actual stage of development of a given science, one type may be preferred to another.
I would have preferred saying nothing about it.
Double-peaked histograms of velocity fluctuations imply that the velocity has two preferred states.
Where the mediator is chosen, therefore, the equally uninterested will be preferred (other things being equal) to the equally interested.
While we preferred the first solution for its elegance, we chose the second for pragmatic reasons.
The use of two flour layers should be preferred to the use of a single layer.
The cane-cutters preferred the twelve-month cane; the 24-month cane was reported to be harder to cut, had lodged and was infested with weeds.
